results.title: React Hook Form
results.description: Performant, flexible, and extensible React forms with easy-to-use validation using custom hooks.

results.title: Next Safe Action Adapter React Hook Form
results.description: This adapter seamlessly integrates next-safe-action with react-hook-form, providing hooks like useHookFormAction and useHookFormOptimisticAction for easier form handling and validation error mapping.

results.title: React Hook Form
results.description: React Hook Form is a performant, flexible, and extensible forms with easy-to-use validation for React applications.

results.title: Remix Hook Form
results.description: Remix-hook-form is a lightweight wrapper around react-hook-form for streamlined form handling in React Router applications, offering zero dependencies and progressive enhancement.

results.title: React Hook Form MUI
results.description: This project simplifies the use of react-hook-form and Material-UI by providing opinionated components for form creation and management.

results.title: React Hookz Web
results.description: A library of general-purpose React hooks built with care and SSR compatibility in mind, offering a spiritual successor to react-use.

results.title: React Hotkeys Hook
results.description: A React hook for using keyboard shortcuts in components in a declarative way, allowing for scopes and focus trapping.

results.title: RA-Core
results.description: RA-Core is a headless framework for React, offering battle-tested hooks and components for building high-performance SPAs with react-query, react-hook-form, and react-router, compatible with any REST or GraphQL API.

results.title: Frappe React SDK
results.description: React hooks for Frappe

results.title: React Remark
results.description: React Remark provides React hooks and components for rendering Markdown into React elements using the remark ecosystem.

results.title: Relay Hooks
results.description: Relay Hooks provides React hooks for using Relay, enabling offline capabilities and offering alternatives to Relay's built-in hooks for easier adoption.

results.title: Raviger
results.description: React routing with hooks

results.title: React Use Intercom
results.description: A React integration for Intercom powered by hooks, offering a tiny, TypeScript-based abstraction with SSR safeguards and compatibility with existing Intercom instances.

results.title: React Intersection Observer Hook
results.description: An easy-to-use React hook package for declaratively using the Intersection Observer API to track component visibility, implement lazy loading, trigger animations, and more.

results.title: Rehooks
results.description: Rehooks is a CLI tool designed to scaffold custom React hooks, emphasizing performance, reusability, and type-safety.

results.title: React Infinite Scroll Hook
results.description: A React hook that simplifies the creation of infinite scroll components using the Intersection Observer API.

results.title: React Query Builder
results.description: A TypeScript React hook for building query strings compatible with spatie/laravel-query-builder, offering methods for filtering, sorting, including, and pagination.

results.title: Lets Form
results.description: LetsForm is an open-source tool for generating React forms from JSON schemas, supporting Material UI, Bootstrap, Ant Design, RSuite, and Mantine, and built on React Hook Form.

results.title: React Use OAuth2
results.description: A custom React hook simplifying OAuth2 authorization, supporting Authorization Code and Implicit Grant flows with features like popup handling and state persistence.

results.title: Pretty React Hooks
results.description: üíê A collection of useful hooks for roblox-ts and React

results.title: Flutter Hooks
results.description: React hooks for Flutter. Hooks are a new kind of object that manages a Widget life-cycles. They are used to increase code sharing between widgets and as a complete replacement for StatefulWidget.

results.title: Field Form
results.description: rc-field-form is a high-performance React form component that supports React.js and React Native, with features like field validation using async-validator.

results.title: Hamo
results.description: Hamo is a collection of custom, performance-oriented React hooks designed to enhance component functionality and tracking.

results.title: Plebbit React Hooks
results.description: A collection of React hooks for interacting with the Plebbit protocol, enabling developers to build decentralized applications with features like comments, votes, subplebbits, and feeds.

results.title: usehooks-ts
results.description: usehooks-ts is a React hooks library written in TypeScript, providing a ready-to-use, tree-shakable set of hooks to build React applications faster and follow DRY principles.

results.title: React Use WebSocket
results.description: React Hook for WebSocket communication

results.title: MinHook
results.description: A Rust wrapper for the MinHook library, providing a way to create function hooks and call original functions.

results.title: Rooks
results.description: Rooks is a collection of essential React custom hooks designed to enhance component functionality and simplify development.

results.title: wavesurfer.js React
results.description: A React component and hook for wavesurfer.js, simplifying the integration of audio waveform visualization and playback into React applications with familiar options and event handling.

results.title: Use Async Effekt
results.description: React hooks for handling asynchronous effects with proper dependency tracking, cleanup management, and race condition protection.
